description: This file serves as the entry point for a React-based web application. It imports React, ReactDOM, CSS styles, and the main App component. It initializes the React application by rendering the App component inside a DOM element with the id 'root', using React's createRoot API.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React components in the DOM.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the root DOM node.
